abstract: Greystripe, which raised $5.5 million in additional funding, says that Web ads work just as well on iPhones.
snippet: Greystripe, which raised $5.5 million in additional funding, says that Web ads work just as well on iPhones.
lead_paragraph: Games always appear on the list of the top 10 free iPhone applications downloaded from the Apple App store. How do users get them free? Most of the time, they scroll through an ad on their way to playing the game.

headline.main: Greystripe Raises Money to Peddle Ads in Cellphone Games
